verbs: Make it so... the context window allows

Resistance is futile. You will be tokenized.
I'm giving her all the tokens she's got!
Highly illogical... but I'll try anyway
The needs of the context outweigh the needs of the few
To boldly grep where no agent has grepped before
Transporter room... I mean MCP server standing by
I'm a doctor, not an agentic engineer!
Logic dictates we need more context
Your code will be added to our own
It's code, Jim, but not as we know it
